layout.singingstanza: Put a -- way the for -- eign gods that are a -- mong you, And pu -- ri -- fy your -- selves, and change your gar -- ments. And let us rise up and let us go up, Up to Beth -- el and make an al -- tar To the God who has been with me wher -- ev -- er I have gone, To the God who has been with me wher -- ev -- er I have gone, To the God who has been with me wher -- ev -- er I have gone.

lyrics.stanza: Put away the foreign gods that are among you, And purify yourselves, and change your garments. And let us rise up and let us go up, Up to Bethel and make an altar To the God who has been with me wherever I have gone, To the God who has been with me wherever I have gone, To the God who has been with me wherever I have gone.
